==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|だい|とう|あ|きょう|えい|けん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
A slogan promulgated during World War II by the Japanese government and military used as a means to rationalize rule over Asia.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|だいとうあ きょうえいかん|yomi=o}}
